===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|尸|米|ls=p|t1=body|t2=rice}}. The {{lang|zh|米}} component was originally four dots (faeces coming out of the backside) in the [[oracle bone script]], thus a pictogram representing a man defecating.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*kləj||excrement}}.

==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=尸06}}

# [[excrement]], [[feces]], [[poop]]

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[し]] (shi)
|kanon=[[し]] (shi)
|kun=[[くそ]] (kuso), [[ばば]] (baba) {{non-joyo-reading}}
}}

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|くそ}}
Cognate with {{m|ja|臭い|tr=kusai||stinky, smelly}}, {{m|ja|腐る|tr=kusaru||to rot, to become stinky}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|くそ|acc=2|dev=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|糞}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|くそ}}

# {{lb|ja|colloquial|sort=くそ}} [[feces]], [[excrement]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|屎っ垂れ|くそったれ}}: [[dingleberry]] {{qualifier|vulgar epithet}}
* {{ja-r|目屎|めくそ}}: [[rheum]], [[eye]] [[mucus]]
{{der-bottom}}

=====Idioms=====
* {{ja-r|屎の役にも立たぬ|くそ の やく に も たたぬ}}: “not even standing in the role of shit” → not even good for shit
*:: (See {{ja-r|役に立つ|やく に たつ}}: “to be useful, to play a role”)

====Interjection====
{{ja-pos|interjection|くそ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=くそ|expletive}} [[crap]], [[shit]], [[bullshit]], [[poop]]

=====Usage notes=====
This is not considered as profane as the English glosses. For instance, a child of five using the Japanese interjection ''kuso'' would be unremarkable, whereas it would be very socially inappropriate for a child of five to use the English interjection {{m|en|shit}}.

====Prefix====
{{ja-pos|prefix|くそ}}

# {{non-gloss definition|A [[derogatory]] prefix.}}
#: {{ja-usex|'''屎'''爺い|'''くそ'''じじい|'''crappy''' old man}}

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|suffix|くそ}}

# {{non-gloss definition|A [[derogatory]] [[emphasis|emphasizing]] suffix.}}
#: {{ja-usex|下手'''屎'''|へた'''くそ'''|'''crappy''' bad at something; to be '''shit''' at doing something}}
#: {{ja-usex|襤褸'''屎'''|ぼろ'''くそ'''|broken down '''for shit''', raggedy-'''ass'''}}

{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ばば}}
